name: TruSTAR
description: This App integrates with TruSTAR to provide various hunting and reporting actions
latest_tested_versions: Cloud, API station.trustar.co, October 19 2023, API version: v1.3, v2.0

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time to wait after too many requests error (in seconds)

actions.description: Validate credentials provided for connectivity
Get report IDs associated with an IOC
actions.verbose: Input to ioc parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with an IP/CIDR
actions.verbose: Input to ip parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a URL
actions.verbose: Input to url parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a file
actions.verbose: Input to file parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with an email address
actions.verbose: Input to email parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a CVE (Common Vulnerability and Exposure) number
actions.verbose: Input to cve_number parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

cve_number.description: CVE (Common Vulnerability and Exposure) number to hunt

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a malware indicator
actions.verbose: Input to malware parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a registry key
actions.verbose: Input to registry_key parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report IDs associated with a bitcoin address
actions.verbose: Input to bitcoin_address parameter must be greater than 3 characters.

actions.description: Get report details
actions.verbose:
The id_type parameter can be one of the following values:
  • internal
  • external

example_values: WannaCry ransomware used in widespread attacks

actions.description: Copy a report to another enclave
Move a report to another enclave
Delete a report
actions.verbose:
The id_type parameter can be one of the following values:
  • internal
  • external

actions.description: Submit report to TruSTAR
actions.verbose: If distribution_type selected is ENCLAVE, enclave_ids must be provided from the ones configured in the asset. If time_discovered is not provided, the action will consider current system time.

time_discovered.description: ISO-8601 formatted incident time with timezone (e.g. "2016-09-22T11:38:35+00:00")

external_tracking_id.description: External tracking ID (possibly a JIRA ticket number)

external_url.description: External URL (possibly a link to a JIRA ticket)

actions.description: Update a TruSTAR report

time_discovered.description: ISO-8601 formatted incident time with timezone (e.g. "2016-09-22T11:38:35+00:00")

external_tracking_id.description: External tracking ID (possibly a JIRA ticket number)

external_url.description: External URL (possibly a link to a JIRA ticket)

actions.description: Add IOCs to the whitelist
actions.verbose: Input to ioc parameter must be greater than 3 characters. The type of the IOC will be determined by TruSTAR.

ioc.description: A comma-separated list of IOCs to add to the whitelist

actions.description: Remove IOC from the whitelist
actions.verbose: Input to ioc parameter must be greater than 3 characters. The type of the IOC will be determined by TruSTAR.

ioc.description: IOC to remove from the whitelist

ioc_type.description: The type of the given IOC

actions.description: List all the accessible enclaves in TruSTAR
actions.verbose: This action will only list the enclaves that the user has access to.

actions.description: Get a list of emails submitted to Phishing Triage
actions.verbose: If the parameters start_time and end_time are not provided, then last 24 hours data will be fetched. The start_time of the time window must be within 1 month from the current time.

start_time.description: ISO-8601 formatted start time with timezone (e.g. "2021-06-01T11:38:35+00:00") within the last month

end_time.description: ISO-8601 formatted end time with timezone (e.g. "2021-06-23T17:24:42+00:00")

priority_event_score.description: A comma-separated list of priority scores to filter submissions by. Valid options: -1, 0, 1, 2, 3

status.description: A comma-separated list of statuses to filter submissions by. Valid options: CONFIRMED, IGNORED, UNRESOLVED

enclave_ids.description: A comma-separated list of enclave IDs to filter submissions by

actions.description: Get a list of indictors found in phishing submissions
actions.verbose: If the parameters start_time and end_time are not provided, then last 24 hours data will be fetched. The start_time of the time window must be within 1 month from the current time.

indicator_score.description: A comma-separated list of indicator scores to filter indicators by

priority_event_score.description: A comma-separated list of priority scores to filter indicators by

status.description: A comma-separated list of statuses to filter indicators by

enclave_ids.description: A comma-separated list of enclave IDs to filter indicators by

actions.description: Get enriched information of the indictor
actions.verbose:
If the value of the action parameter enclave ids is kept empty, then the value will be considered the same as a configuration parameter's value. If the configuration parameter is also kept empty, nothing will be passed in enclave ids parameter, and data from all the enclaves for which the user has READ access will be fetched.
This action will fetch the data for the past one year.

indicator_value.description: The indicator value to search for

indicator_types.description: A comma-separated list of indicator types to filter indicators by

enclave_ids.description: A comma-separated list of enclave IDs to filter indicators by

limit.description: Specify the number of indicators to return (default value = 10000)

actions.description: Get the structured summaries about indicators
actions.verbose: If the value of the action parameter enclave ids is kept empty, then the value will be considered the same as a configuration parameter's value. If the configuration parameter is also kept empty, nothing will be passed in enclave ids parameter, and data from all the enclaves for which the user has READ access will be fetched.

indicator_values.description: A comma-separated list of indicator values to query

enclave_ids.description: A comma-separated list of enclave IDs to filter indicators by

actions.description: Get the metadata associated with the indicator
actions.verbose:
If the indicator types field is used, it must be present for all entries in the indicator values parameter. i.e. The length of indicator types and indicator values parameters should be the same.

If the value of the action parameter enclave ids is kept empty, then the value will be considered the same as a configuration parameter's value. If the configuration parameter is also kept empty, nothing will be passed in enclave ids parameter, and data from all the enclaves for which the user has READ access will be fetched.

indicator_types.description: A comma-separated list of indicator types

indicator_values.description: A comma-separated list of indicator values to query

enclave_ids.description: A comma-separated list of enclave IDs to filter indicators by

actions.description: Change the status of an email submission

submission_id.description: ID of email submission to triage

status.description: Status to set the email submission to

actions.description: Find all of the entity terms that can be found from applying extraction rules on a chunk of text

payload.description: Text using which all the entities will be extracted

actions.description: Get all valid observable types
